resources.string:
"This screen displays a catalogue of albums.

A long press on an album displays a contextual menu giving the user the option of either going to this album, buying it or adding/removing it from the wishlist.

Clicking on the Wishlist button will display the wishlist."

This screen displays a list of albums the user has added to the wishlist.

A long press on an album displays a contextual menu giving the user the option of either going to this album, buying it or removing it from the wishlist.

Clicking the Catalogue button will bring the user to the Catalogue.
Album %1$d is already in the wishlist
Album %1$d is added to the wishlist
Album %1$d is removed from the wishlist

This screen displays the album\'s list of songs. This list is a mockup.\n\nClicking the Read more button will display the album detail, the price button will display the payment screen. And the user can add or remove the album to or from the wishlist, go to the wishlist or the catalogue.
This ListView is a mockup. Song playback is not implemented.
This screen aims to provide detail about the album.\nThe following fields are a mockup.
Information about the singer or band, the popularity of the album, etc.
Music genre (eg. Pop, South America, World)
Streaming or by download to your computer and/or device
Via your favourite music player app, or by exporting MP3 files to your computer and playing on any MP3 compatible music player

This screen is about the payment of the selected album. The payment is not implemented.
